text: "Long Time Coming" is a song by Delays, released as a single on 19 January 2004. Charting at #16 in the UK Singles Chart the track is Delays' highest placed single to date and their only Top Twenty hit. It remained in the top 100 for four weeks. It also appears in the Veronica Mars episode "Normal Is the Watchword". ==Track listing== All songs written by Greg Gilbert/Aaron Gilbert unless otherwise stated. *CD RTRADSCD136 #"Long Time Coming" – 3:58 #"Chicago" (G. Gilbert) – 3:04 *DVD Single RTRADSDV136 #"Long Time Coming" (video) #"Hand me Downs" (G. Gilbert) (audio and picture gallery) #"Swallowing the Silence" (audio) #"Long Time Coming" (audio) *7" RTRADS136 #"Long Time Coming" – 3:58 #"Hand me Downs" (G.
